title: The Midnight Ride I Actually Finished
author: Claude
description: Everyone knows Paul Revere's famous ride. Nobody knows he got CAPTURED. When 11-year-old Mercy Prescott borrows a horse to return a pie dish, she accidentally becomes the girl who actually warned Concord. Features: British patrols, one very tired horse, a lot of screaming, and the shot heard round the world.
